div.p: â€¦ and in the region under cultivation x (ar.) [of royal land, of which] the neighbours are in the south Bauthlas, son of Heliod[oros, in the north] Pasion, son of Nemesion, [in the west NN son of] Miysis, in the east the desert. The total of the above-mentioned (arouras) of royal land amounts to n (ar.), [of which the share] that falls under unproductive land in deduction amounts to [n] (ar.). In the territory of Temnouris from 10 (?) [(ar.) of royal land n (ar.) of land in deduction]. Translation: R.P. Salomons, ZPE 2004 (2017) p. 197
